abstract: Moody's Investors Service downgrades Chicago's credit rating to junk status, days after Illinois Supreme Court barred state overhaul of pension system; court ruling raised questions about legality of Chicago's changes to two of its pension funds.
lead_paragraph: Days after the Illinois Supreme Court rejected an overhaul aimed at shoring up the state’s troubled pension system, Chicago saw its credit rating downgraded two levels to junk status.

headline.main: Illinois: Chicago’s Credit Rating Is Downgraded
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Chicago’s Credit Rating Is Downgraded

snippet: Days after the Illinois Supreme Court rejected an overhaul aimed at shoring up the state’s troubled pension system, Chicago saw its credit rating downgraded two levels to junk status.
